There are no files in this Torrent! :/ Whaaat? Never seen that before. :/ :/ :/

Scratch my last comment.... I rebooted my computer and reloaded the torrent file to UTorrent again and it eventually started working.
Never had/seen that problem before so was VERY confused. :/
